text: Tridrepana melliflua is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Warren in 1922. It is found in New Guinea, but probably also occurs in Papua New Guinea.The Hooktips (Drepanidae, Drepaninae) of Papua Indonesia The wingspan is about 31.8-35.4 mm for males and 35.2-43.8 mm for females. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1922 Category:Drepaninae Category:Moths of New Guinea
title: Tridrepana melliflua
